title: The Ball Finally Bounces the Nationals’ Way in the Postseason
text:
The stench of October failure follows the Washington Nationals like a shadow, the product of a generation of disappointment and missed opportunity that defines the franchise. Four times this decade they made the playoffs. All four times they fell in the first round, often in painful and embarrassing fashion.

Until their very last batter of Tuesday night’s National League wild-card game, the stage seemed set for a repeat, yet another ignominious exit to add to their growing collection of autumn meltdowns. But then, like a curse...
description: The Washington Nationals scored three runs in the bottom of the eighth inning to stun the Milwaukee Brewers 4-3 in the NL wild-card game.
